pros: Great institution! Definitely recommend working here.
cons: I think support with financial aid for students could improve.

pros: Teaching at Martin University would provide an adjunct with the experience of dealing with a diverse student population
cons: When I was there the supervisors seemed to be building a doctoral community more for job security than for student growth.

review_title: It was an educational and challenging experience
pros: Martin University is professional and dedicated with a staff of devoted professors and teachers internships and employment opportunities are stressed while you attend.
cons: there were no cons in this employment field...staying dedicated ensures that for yourself.

pros: Martin University is a great company to work for and attend for school related issues
cons: Can't keep up with the economy so they constantly let staff go.
